Responses.string: Strength affects what you can pickup, your damage, health and health recovery.
Agility affects your running speed, jump height, stamina, stamina recovery and rate of fire with ranged weapons.
Dextirity affects accuracy with ranged weapons and damage with weapons where technique matters.
Mind affects what you can pickup and your damage.

DialogueNode.TextMessage: Hello $PlayerName. This dialogue system uses a Topics system. As you talk to NPCs and learn new Topics, you can ask about them by selecting the "Ask" choice below.

DialogueNodeXML.TextMessage: Stats range between 1 to 10. Your stats include: <color=red>Strength</color>, <color=red>Agility</color>, <color=red>Dextirity</color> and <color=red>Mind</color>. You can open the stats view by pressing [J] and edit them.
You can walk away to end this conversation. Come back when you want to ask anything!
